data.name: Fashion Police Squad Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Grab your Tailormade and get ready to swing into action across Trendopolis with the original Fashion Police Squad Soundtrack! Featuring 31 absolute bangers to get suited and booted to, both in MP3 and FLAC formats!

All tracks are composed by Lassi Vihko and Tommi Vihko from Geem Audioworks!
